verses.plain: Help, LORD; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.

tokens.t: ; for the godly man ceaseth; for the faithful fail from among the children of men.

verses.plain: They speak vanity every one with his neighbour: with flattering lips and with a double heart do they speak.

tokens.t: They speak vanity every one with his neighbour:
with a double heart do they speak.

verses.plain: The LORD shall cut off all flattering lips, and the tongue that speaketh proud things:

tokens.t: shall cut off all flattering lips,
the tongue that speaketh proud things:

verses.plain: Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips are our own: who is lord over us?

tokens.t: Who have said, With our tongue will we prevail; our lips

verses.plain: For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the LORD; I will set him in safety from him that puffeth at him.

tokens.t: For the oppression of the poor, for the sighing of the needy, now will I arise, saith the

verses.plain: The words of the LORD are pure words: as silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.

tokens.t: silver tried in a furnace of earth, purified seven times.

verses.plain: Thou shalt keep them, O LORD, thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.

tokens.t: , thou shalt preserve them from this generation for ever.

verses.plain: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.

tokens.t: The wicked walk on every side, when the vilest men are exalted.

footnotes.text: a double…: Heb. an heart and an heart
them from: Heb. him, etc: that is, every one of them, etc
men: Heb. of the sons of the men
